April 2015 Analytics, Big Data, Data Mining Acquisitions and Startups Activity

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Cloudera, Datazen, Domo, IBM Watson, Microsoft, MongoDB, Palantir, Revolution Analytics, startups

Apr 2015 acquisitions, startups, and company activity in Analytics, Big Data, Data Mining, and Data Science: Microsoft + RevolutionR, Most-Funded Startups, VC says boom not bubble - look at valuations, and more.


By Gregory Piatetsky, @kdnuggets.

My monthly summary of the company, startup, and acquisition activity for April 2015 from @kdnuggets. See the latest under hashtag #BigDataCo.

Here are KDnuggets tweets, sorted by decreasing number of engagements,

  • Apr 14: .@Hortonworks buys SequenceIQ, to speed cloud- and #Docker-based #Hadoop deployments #BigDataCo t.co/DfxhdViFrh

  • Apr 14: RemitDATA buys IF Technologies, Lexington KY firm, for Comparative Data #Analytics for #Healthcare #BigDataCo t.co/xMm8vHkTxw
  • Apr 10: Gravy, Leesburg-VA marketing, event #analytics company gets $7.6M Series A led by Gannett #BigDataCo t.co/KRvjejnDLs
